title: Ticket #4449: ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHING true on windows causes condor_status to crash
description: Turning on ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHING on windows causes condor_status to croak after giving the result from the query. In test classad_cache-basic, this leads to the test failing as it can never see the schedd in the collector and the personal used for the test does not believe it has completely come up causing the test to fail.
remarks: this is a dup of #4459
creator: bt
